tool_description:
Indeed Jobs API - Sweden
Get the Jobs List as JSON by giving Keyword, Location (Sweden Only) and offset value.
Contact me at: vuesdata@gmail.com or visit https://www.vuesdata.com for building custom spiders or custom requests.
title: Indeed Jobs API - Sweden

api_list.name: SearchJobs
api_list.description:
offset = 0 (starting of the page, it must be increased by 10 to achieve pagination)
keyword = python (it can be any search keyword for ex: job title or skill title)
location = Stockholm (For now this API gets data for Sweden Indeed. You can enter a specific city or state.)
This will provide you with a list of 15 jobs in the page, by default a single page can have a max of 15 jobs posting only. In order to get all the data using pagination you need to keep increasing the count of offset by 10.

You will get the following fields using this API.

'position'
'company_name'
'job_title'
'job_location'
'salary'
'date'
'job_url'
'urgently_hiring'
'multiple_hiring'
'company_rating'
'company_reviews'
'company_review_link'
'company_logo_url'
'page_number'

utterances.utterance: Can you find me software developer jobs in Gothenburg that require Python skills?
Show me data analyst positions in Malmö with expertise in Python.
I want to see Python programming job openings in Uppsala.
List all Python developer roles available in Västerås.
Are there any machine learning engineer jobs in Örebro that require Python?
Find me backend developer positions in Linköping with Python experience.
Search for Python automation tester jobs in Helsingborg.
Are there any openings for Python software engineers in Jönköping?
Show me all available Python developer jobs in Norrköping.
I am looking for entry-level Python programmer roles in Lund.
